sheets.name: Orders
sheets.query: SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE OrderDate >= '${startDate}' AND OrderDate <= '${endDate}'

sheets.name: Customers
sheets.query: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE region IN (${regionList})

sheets.name: 배열변수_주문상태별_조회
sheets.query: SELECT OrderNumber, OrderDate, OrderStatus, PaymentStatus, TotalAmount FROM Orders WHERE OrderDate >= '${startDate}' AND OrderDate <= '${endDate}' AND OrderStatus IN (${statusList})

sheets.name: 배열변수_카테고리별_상품
sheets.query: SELECT p.ProductID, p.ProductName, c.CategoryName, p.UnitPrice FROM Products p INNER JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE p.CategoryID IN (${categoryIds})
